description: Update an incident unit of measure quantity
permissions: User must be authorized to create the related incident per IncidentPolicy (or be an admin), as IncidentUnitOfMeasureQuantity permissions defer to the incident policy.
side_effects: Updates an incident unit of measure quantity and touches the associated tender_job_schedule_shift and job_production_plan after commit.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one field must be updated. --incident-type and --incident-id must be provided together; providing both empty clears the incident relationship. --quantity and --unit-of-measure accept empty values to clear. quantity must be numeric. incident and unit_of_measure relationships are required.

flags.name: --unit-of-measure
flags.validation: Empty value clears the unit of measure relationship.
